projects.title: Yatzy Game
projects.bodyText:
-  Developed a single-player Yatzy game using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, integrating server-side functionality to manage game state and calculate scores
 -  Implemented AJAX communication between the frontend and backend, allowing dynamic updates of game status and leaderboard scores, enhancing user interactivity and experience.

projects.title: Hotel Management System
projects.bodyText:
-  e-hotel web application with a database that performs administrative actions based on the user role
 -  Dynamic, users and admin can easily change data.

projects.title: Healthcare Appointment Management System
projects.bodyText: - Android application using **Java** and **Android Studio** to streamline the process of healthcare appointment scheduling and management via different roles which gain access to their associative information.

projects.title: myFirstFinance
projects.bodyText:
- Full-stack web application using a variety of technologies such as **React** to create the frontend
 - Developed collaboratively for the Concordia University hackathon (ConUHacks)
